recommended_degree: Teknik Elektro, Teknik Energi, Teknik Fisika, Teknik Instrumentasi, Teknik Manufaktur Mesin (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assisting in machine or equipment maintenance data recording.
Supporting improvement and modification projects.
Helping with technical drawing or documentation.
Assisting preventive maintenance scheduling and follow-up.
Observing production line performance and reporting findings.
